metadata.name: Suspicious Debugger Registration Cmdline
metadata.comment: Detects the registration of a debugger for a program that is available in the logon screen (sticky key backdoor).

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\currentversion\\\\image file execution options\\\\')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sethc.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('utilman.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('osk.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('magnify.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('narrator.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('displayswitch.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('atbroker.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('helppane.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects the registration of a debugger for a program that is available in the logon screen (sticky key backdoor).
